sys_ui_macro.name: ADManagerMgmtButtons
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<button type="button" id="admp_search_button" onclick="searchUsers();" class="btn btn-primary" style="display: none; margin-right: 15px;">Search</button>
	<button type="button" id="admp_submit_button" onclick="saveProducer('');" class="btn btn-primary" style="display: none;">Submit</button>
	<script>
		function showSearchButton(isShow) {
			if(isShow == true) {
				$j("#admp_search_button").show();
			} else if(isShow == false) {
				$j("#admp_search_button").hide();
			}
		}
		
		function showSubmitButton(isShow) {
			if(isShow == true) {
				$j("#admp_submit_button").show();
			} else if(isShow == false) {
				$j("#admp_submit_button").hide();
			}
		}
	</script>
</j:jelly>
